character.noteList: Elf Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Immune to magical sleep, advantage on saves vs charmed • Meditating 4 hours counts as 8 hours of rest • Perception proficiency • While in direct sunlight, you have disadvantage on attack rolls and perception checks • Can cast the dancing lights cantrip. At 3rd level, faerie fire (1/day). At 5th level, darkness (1/day) (use Cha for DCs) • Training: Rapier, shortsword, and hand crossbow proficiency Guild Artisan Feature: • While you are in good standing with your guild, your guild can gain you access to powerful politicians Class Features: • Cleric Archetype: Death • Gain a cantrip of the necromancy school, and your single target necromancy cantrips can target two adjacent enemies • Turn Undead (see rules) • Touch of Death (see rules) • Kill CR ½ undead that fail save vs turning • Additional divinity per rest • Your abilities and cleric spells that deal necrotic damage ignore resistance • CR 1 undead can now be killed • Deal 1d8 extra damage on one weapon attack each turn (see rules) • Seek aid from your deity (see rules) • CR 2 undead can now be killed • CR 3 undead can now be killed • Increase to 2d8 extra damage • Mobile: You gain +10 to speed, ignore difficult terrain when you dash, and you don't provoke from creatures you've attacked that turn • CR 4 undead can now be killed • Your single target necromancy spells of at most 5th level can target two adjacent enemies • Additional divinity per rest • Calls to your deity for aid are always answered ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields ⊠Rapiers, Shortswords, Hand Crossbows Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons ⊠One type of artisan's tools ⊠Common, Elvish One Extra Language ⊠mace shield holy symbol light crossbow + 20 bolts OR one simple weapon priest's pack OR explorer's pack set of artisan's tools of your choice letter of introduction set of bone dice OR deck of cards set of traveler's clothes belt pouch scale mail ⊠⊠Cleric 20⊠Dark Elf⊠Guild Artisan⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Hey man who has been redesigned from you and the rest of us⊠Cleric 20⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠15⊠0⊠0
